snippet: One of the few constants in the Giants’ run to two Super Bowl titles in the past five years has been the presence of Little Bear, the offensive line’s prized stuffed animal.
abstract: One of few constants in New York Giants run to two Super Bowl titles over past five years has been presence of Little Bear, offensive line’s prized stuffed animal.
lead_paragraph: One of the few constants in the Giants’ run to two Super Bowl titles in the past five years has been the presence of Little Bear, the offensive line’s prized stuffed animal.

headline.seo: Giants Have a Soft Spot for the Team Talisman
headline.main: Giants’ Fuzzy Pal: Blue Bear, Blue Bear, What Do You See?

Blue Bear,
Blue Bear,
What Do You See?
